name: Passing of The Dawn
description:
What is the proper legacy to leave behind?

Rai, a once-great swordsman, will soon die of an incurable disease.  Before he goes, he calls for a family reunion to decide who will inherit leadership and his sword Dawnbreaker.

With different motivations, passions, and reasonings clashing, he must repair what's broken in his family before leaving everything to the next generation.

This is a short kinetic visual novel about legacy and what it means to lead the next generation.

Made By:

Writer- Blankmarks

Writer- Joshy Gambino

Music- Ymacco

Art- Marina Malsh
Programmer- Kappuchuu

All free resources music and SFX used are in the downloads.
